ai-anya-e0105n19:1_0: Others thought, “The Indeed is the elephant called Mahisa; the fragrant without a citadel has hunted his lion’s threshold, and he said to the town,”
ai-anya-e0105n19:1_1: The one having conquered that Dhamma, rejoicing thus: “This one, I do not allow a calf to the southern of the Supreme, I summoned many people, collected the hunting like a chariot-maker, and went to the Indra.
ai-anya-e0105n19:1_2: Thus this nutriment has arisen for you with the oil-lamp.
ai-anya-e0105n19:1_3: Like that the Buddha awakened for themselves having performed the eight voices, having performed a lion’s sesame seed, and that was being considered to be considered all over the way.”
